## Introduction

------------------------------------------------------------------------

This document is part of the research compendium deliverable for the MLARPIS course of MSBBSS 2025/2026. I will be creating a reproducible file for [this](https://wwwn.cdc.gov/nchs/nhanes/continuousnhanes/default.aspx?Begi-nYear=2015) project by the CDC. The data relevant to this specific study can be found [here](https://github.com/mlarpis/markup/tree/main/documents/week-4/raw_data).
